gameDetails.name: Coimbra: Royal Treatment
gameDetails.description:
Inside you'll find a felt-lined box that serves as a dice tray. Players will also find 4 uniquely designed,  dual-colored dice that introduces deeper strategy with another challenging decision - an option for another income die or to trade resources for different income. Lastly, included is another end game scoring category.

Contents:

     1 Deluxe dice box (felt-lined)
     4 custom dice
     4 wooden bells (1 in each color)
     1 rule book
